content.rendered:
// what we offer

Committed to Communication
Excellence since 1985.

Connect USA performs work throughout the United States and is committed to the highest level of reliability and efficiency attainable for our customers. To achieve this level of performance, we routinely set standards that exceed the desired outcomes. We take proactive approaches to task performance and challenge our staff to commit to every task with the determination to succeed. We believe this attitude assures our customers of our sincere intentions to find complete solutions to all technical requirements.

We take pride in our experience and attribute our continued success to consciously working with our individual clients before, during, and after the installation process. Connect USA has provided integrated voice and data cabling solutions for the past 23 years and an active member of BICSI as well as a Commscope Certified Installer.

// In the world of telecom

In the world of telecom today, a data division specialist is a must to adequately support and install even the most basic structured network systems. At Connect USA, not only do we have the background and experience of telecom, we also have a data division with the experience to provide a complete data / voice structured cabling network solution.

Voice structured cabling network solution

Our structured network cabling division can design a voice and data cabling plan that will support the technology of today as well as the technology of the future. Your voice and data cabling is the core of your network. These are just a few of the complete integration of services we consult our clients about.
